column2: Ku bwe mulugunya, Lery Pounds batwesizza bubiri nnyo.
column3: kwe mulugunya, very bad, batuyisiza buubi nnyo.

column2: OCCID aliwe lukami, OC station aliwe lukami, DPC aliwe lukamyu, MCB aliwe lukamyu, basirikale bano abali mu ofiisi bo tebayina buzibu obalaba nga baliredde okutuyamba ffe abantu nkabulijjo
column3: OCCID ali welcoming, OC station ali welcoming, DPC ali welcoming, MCB ali welcoming, basirikale bano abali mu ofiisi bo tebayina buzibu obalaba nga bali ready okutuyamba ffe abantu nkabulijjo

column2: Old Kampala poliisi simbi naye abaserikale wano Kotagaali batutawaanya nnyo nga tuyingira kye kizibu kyaffe kyokka kye tulina abantu ba bulijjo
column3: Old Kampala poliisi simbi naye abaserikale wano quarter guard batutawaanya nnyo nga tuyingira kye kizibu kyaffe kyokka kye tulina abantu ba bulijjo
column4: Old Kampala police station is not bad but the officers here quarter guard are inconveniencing us while we are entering that is our only problem we have people they are ordinary people.

column2: Yo yo, very good work, Old Kampala, Uganda Police Forces.
column3: Yo yo, very good work, Old Kampala, Uganda Police Forces.

column2: Today mbadde nzize kufuna repressimenti koze yesterday I lost my phone and bag yabaddemu sente naye rwine obwenzize badde sinaba na kwogera kye neetaaga ne lw'okuba abadabinenda nga muntu
column3: Today mbadde nzize kufuna replacement because yesterday I lost my phone and my bag yabaddemu sente naye right now bwenzize mbadde sinaba na kwogera kye neetaaga naye lw'okuba bandabye ne ndaga muntu
column4: Today I have come to get a replacement because yesterday I lost my phone and my bag had money in it but right now I am cheating i didn't have to say what i needed to say but since they saw me, i showed them who i was

column2: Kunange nebaza b'ekitongole mwenna okutulwanirira n'okutufaako naye siriimu essira.
column3: banange nebaza b'ekitongole mwenna okutulwanirira n'okutufaako
column4: thank you all the department for fighting for us and caring for us

column2: Ekirala abasirikale b'olupiiki obwa poliisi, ffe abasuubuzi bwe twatadde ebintu byaffe ku booda batuyimiriza nnyo ne batamba.
column3: Ekirala abasirikale b'obupiiki obwa poliisi, ffe abasuubuzi bwe tuba tutadde ebintu byaffe ku booda batuyimiriza nnyo ne batusaba.
column4: Also the police motorcycle officers, we vendors when we are loading our goods on the bodaboda they stop us a lot and beg us.
